ro.unitbv.pythia

Class FAMR

  • java.lang.Object
    • ro.unitbv.pythia.FAMR
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class FAMR
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is a modified Fuzzy Artmap model implementation for classification. The essential modification, compared to Carpenter's et al. model is in class Mapfield, where the values w_ab have a completely different meaning and formula.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • FAMR

        public FAMR(double rho_init_a,
            double beta_a,
            double rho_ab,
            int epochs,
            double iMin,
            double iMax,
            int outputDim)
        Parameters:
        rho_init_a - baseline vigilance parameter
        beta_a - used for category learning
        rho_ab - mapfield threshold
        epochs - how many iterations over the training set
        iMin - minimum input value
        iMax - maximum output value
        outputDim - maximum number of classes
